issue.title: [C++] Benchmark CSV writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14993](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14993). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The CSV writer in C++ is still relatively new and has no benchmarks; now that it's getting some more work done (e.g. ARROW-14905, ARROW-14906) we should add benchmarks to track its performance and guard against regressions.
